patthana23.39:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
patthana23.39:0.3_0: he should apply himself to the skillful.
patthana23.39:1.1_0: He doesn’t give rise to the teaching of the skillful qualities that make them a cause or reason for so.
patthana23.39:1.1_1: He doesn’t give rise to the teaching of the skillful teaching, not for the sake of criticism.
patthana23.39:1.1_2: One who doesn’t practice in the teaching of the skillful, and the blameless, inferior and superior, and those on the side of the skillful.
patthana23.39:2.1_0: One who doesn’t practice in line with the teaching to the skillful, the unskillful is not the cause or condition for the corruption of views.
patthana23.39:3.1_0: not declared: ‘... for seven years old.’
patthana23.39:5.1_0: Trial periods for one month, etc. ...
